document_name: Energy Sources Regulations (Energy Efficiency of Electric Induction Engines), 2004
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ISR/2004/ISR-2004-01-01-Energy Sources Regulations (Energy Efficiency of Electric Induction Engines), 2004_2af569d954123176151aa3da6d004ab7.pdf
document_description: The regulations set energy efficiency standards for induction motors, preventing the manufacturing, sale, import, marketing or exhibition of Three-phase asynchronous electrical induction motors if they fail to meet the standards set in the regulations.
